page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Our area for the Domesday project is mostly farm land but includes part of Skellingthorpe and Burton. The land is mainly flat but rises slightly at Burton. There are only a few houses and no shops, but there are two garages, a cafe and two public houses. Both the Fossdyke canal and the new Lincoln bypass go through the area. Near Burton there are some gravel pits which are now a nature reserve. There is a sewerage works and pumping station at Skellingthorpe and not far away from there is a slaughter house. Lincoln race course is also partly within our area.
